sub_title: Managing Director at Global Anti Scam Alliance & ScamAdviser
summary:
Jorij Abraham has been part of the international eCommerce community since 1997. He has been manager e-commerce at Bijenkorf (an upmarket department store chain), TUI (Europe‚Äôs largest travel organization), online publisher at Sanoma Media (the largest media company in the Benelux) and Director of Consulting as Unic (an Europe wide e-commerce strategy & implementation firm). In parallel to these activities he (fellow) founded two companies, eVentures Europe and vZine. 

In 2011 he set-up the Ecommerce Foundation to foster global digital trade. From 2013 ‚Äì 2017 he has been Director of Research & Advice at Thuiswinkel.org (the Dutch Ecommerce Association) and Ecommerce Europe (the European Ecommerce Association with 25.000+ members in 20 countries). 

He now is Managing Director of the Global Anti Scam Alliance, whose mission is to prevent consumers worldwide from getting scammed and ScamAdviser.com, the global blacklist for malicious websites. He is also e-commerce professor at the University of Applies Sciences, TIO.

projects:
[{'title': 'Chairman Expert group Packaging', 'date': {'start': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': 'As part of Shopping2020 guided the expert group Packaging to create chapter for the ShoppingTomorrow book. The chapter includes packaging trends, describes the packaging process and offers a concrete checklist on how to chose packaging material.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Jorij', 'last_name': 'Abraham', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Managing Director at Global Anti Scam Alliance & ScamAdviser'}]}, {'title': 'Shopping2020: Hoe shopt uw klant in 2020', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'description': 'Over Shopping2020

Het onderzoeksprogramma Shopping2020 heeft als doel om een toekomstvisie op de online verkoop van producten en diensten te ontwikkelen in een breed maatschappelijk perspectief. ‚ÄòHoe shopt de consument online in 2020 en welke acties moeten worden ondernomen op nationaal, branche- en bedrijfsniveau opdat online ondernemend Nederland hierop succesvol in kan spelen?‚Äô is de vraag die centraal staat in het Shopping2020-programma.
 
Circa 470 experts verdeeld over 19 expertgroepen zullen vanuit verschillende invalshoeken een bijdrage leveren aan het beantwoorden van deze vraag.
 
Rond de onderzoeksperiode worden drie congressen gehouden waarin tussentijdse resultaten worden gepresenteerd. De planning voor de congressen is als volgt:
Shopping Tomorrow - 13 juni 2013
Shopping Today - 26 september 2013
Shopping TIme - 25 november 2013
